branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, Medium Duty Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Large Bore
branchCategory.description: <p>NCA1 large bore, single rod, double acting, medium duty&nbsp;NFPA interchangeable&nbsp;cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 5, 6 and 8 inches.&nbsp;</p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1, Double Acting, Single Rod, Large Bore
